div.head: The Attestation of a friend touching this Booke, inserted in a Letter to the Translatour.
div.p: —In your Translation you haue laboured, that they that will read may haue delight; and that they that are desirous to commit to memory might haue ease; & that all into whose hands it commeth might haue profit, 2. Mac. 2.25
